name: Amilorides
title: Amilorides
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains Amiloride medications.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients who are on Amiloride medications. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element will map to the Medication category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes RxNorm codes for any form of Amiloride medications.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
